title: Spirit Guard Udyr doesnt have Joke or taunt command?
body:
Is that intentional or its my client bugged?

http://imgur.com/63a24dW

replies.body: He does. He also have specific taunts for Nidalee, Rammus, Volibear and Anivia.

> [{quoted}](name=Lost R,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=2LQQNXZy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-09T05:27:34.972+0000)
>
> He does. He also have specific taunts for Nidalee, Rammus, Volibear and Anivia.

thats odd, when i tried doing it at start (havent used any stance whatsoever) he didnt do anything

will try after getting a stance
He has a joke for every stance,but he doesn't have one when being stanceless at the beginning;)
Without a stance he just lifts up his skirt. It's completely normal
